attributes.action: REDUCED PRESCRIPTION LIMITS ON DIABETES TESTING STRIPS
attributes.additional_details: CAMPAIGN TO GET THE GOVERNMENT TO REVERSE THE DECISION TO PROVIDE ONLY 2 BOXES OF BLOOD GLUCOSE TESTING STRIPS ON PRESCRIPTION PER MONTH FOR DIABETICS. DIABETICS WILL HAVE TO PAY £26/BOX TO BUY EXTRA AND THOSE WITH SERIOUS TYPE 1 DIABETES REQUIRE BEING ABLE TO TEST MORE THAN 2 TIMES PER DAY THESE NEW PRESCRIPTION LIMITS ALLOW.
